divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting out having a smoke and saw a circle I passed it off as a bird because their wings dont always show up at high altitudes but as soon as I thought that it disappeared like a whomp lol disintigrating. It was coming from the west and heading southwest but disappeared. I thought it was a light trick on a bird so I waited for a while and nothing showed back up. I was feeling wowed and noticed it wasn't like the usual ships I see around here. lol I am feeling tired and its an hour later. I didn't lost sight of the object it just disappeared. How do explain that? Cool stuff! XD I swear I didn't call those ships in! No communications with it either. This photo isn't it but its the closest picture that fits the description.
Summary: Metallic sphere flying then disappears in midday!
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Oak Lawn
There were no other sightings in Oak Lawn on or around June 18th 2013
